With QInput you can change the default keybinds! For

With QInputRemap, there's a new command in your options
window called Key Input. When you click that you can
remap your keys! These remapped keys are saved into the
So if you change your default input keys in QInput
you will have to delete that file to see the changes!
Try out the Name Input scene with keyboard support!
You can re-enable the old window with the letters
inside the QNameInput plugin parameters. You can also
resize the width of the name window in the parameters!
